1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.5.0.1.name: Alarm Set
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.5.0.1.description: A system alarm condition has been detected and set

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.5.0.2.name: Alarm Cleared
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.5.0.2.description: A previously set system alarm condition has been cleared

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.1.description: A power supply unit has failed

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.2.name: Power Supply OK
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.2.description: A power supply unit has returned to normal operation

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.4.name: Fan OK
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.4.description: A cooling fan has returned to normal operation

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.5.name: Over Temperature
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.5.description: Device temperature has exceeded critical threshold

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.6.name: Temperature OK
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.1.0.6.description: Device temperature has returned to normal range

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.3.0.1.name: Interface Down
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.3.0.1.description: A network interface has gone down

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.3.0.2.name: Interface Up
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.3.0.2.description: A network interface has come up

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.2.0.1.name: BGP Peer Down

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.2.0.2.description: A BGP peering session has been established

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.2.0.3.name: OSPF Neighbor Down
1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.2.0.3.description: An OSPF neighbor relationship has been lost

1.3.6.1.4.1.2636.4.6.0.2.description: Device configuration changes have been committed
